message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. I believe this reflects its true worth. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $12,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can we meet in the middle at $11,500?
